metadata.title: CVE-2015-5159 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
python-kdcproxy before 0.3.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice via a large POST request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5159` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-kdcproxy - 0.3.2-1
python3-kdcproxy - 0.3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-kdcproxy package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.2-1').
